description.zh-CN: 一个多功能的文件上传组件，处理单个和多个文件上传，支持拖放、文件类型验证和进度跟踪。包含文件预览缩略图、上传取消功能和全面的错误处理，提供强大的文件管理。
description.en-US: A versatile file upload component that handles single and multiple file uploads with drag-and-drop support, file type validation, and progress tracking. Includes file preview thumbnails, upload cancellation, and comprehensive error handling for robust file management.

description.zh-CN: 实用的文件上传组件实现，具有清晰的视觉反馈、直观的拖放区域和有用的验证消息。提供高效的文件处理和用户友好的进度指示。
description.en-US: A practical implementation of the file upload component with clear visual feedback, intuitive drag-and-drop zones, and helpful validation messages throughout the process. Provides efficient file processing, progress indication, and comprehensive error feedback for users.
